span.p:
All schools closed due to state-ordered shutdown.
eLearning is now in effect for all AACPS students.
Future closing and/or delay notices will be posted as soon as they are available

div.span:
Tune in to AACPS-TV, on television or online, for information about the people and programs that help make #AACPSAwesome.
Featured Programming: Join Our AACPS Family!
>

Comcast-Channels 96 & 996 (HD)
Verizon-Channels 36 & 1961 (HD)
Broadstripe-Channels 96 & 496 (HD)
